Module foms
Package foms.management.branch

Class Branch

java.lang.Object
foms.management.branch.Branch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Branch extends Object implements Serializable
The Branch class represents a branch of the organization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Branch

      public Branch(String name, String location, int quota)
      Constructor for Branch Class Create a new Branch.
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the branch.
      location - is the location of the branch. There is 0 staff, 0 manager, 0 total number of staff. Create list of workers, list of orders, menu and list of payment methods in the branch.

  • Method Details

    • checkRatio

      public boolean checkRatio()
      Checks the manpower ratio for the branch.
      Returns:
      true if manpower ratio is correct, false if manpower ratio is wrong.

    • checkQuota

      public boolean checkQuota()
      Check whether the total number of staff exceed the quota.
      Returns:
      true if does not exceed, false if exceed.

    • checkCanAddManager

      public boolean checkCanAddManager()
      Check whether a manager can be assigned base on the quota ratio.
      Returns:
      true if can assign, false if cannot assign.
